SEARCH
Package windowAPI.ui.geometry

Class Transform

java.lang.Object
windowAPI.ui.geometry.Transform
public class Transform extends Object
For now, a class to hold a location only, so that relative coordinates can be used. Later, this will also use the direction and rotation features found in the Geometry crate (rust) by BlueBukkitDev.

  • Constructor Details

    • Transform

      public Transform(SP origin)
      Provides a parent location origin for any Shape.
      A Transform has an origin point of its own, dictated by passed SP and optionally an anchor.
      If an anchor is supplied, then that will dictate the geometric functions applied later. For instance, if an anchor of TOP_LEFT is used, then all math will be as expected, where an increase of X or Y will move the transform right or down, respectively. If an anchor of BOTTOM_RIGHT is used, then an increase of X or Y will move the transform left or up, respectively.
      Parameters:
      origin - - the SimplePoint location of the transform's origin
